text: The execution summary does not reflect the accurate thread/loop count when Include Controllers are present in a test
creator: subhavani.dhas@wipro.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
This happens when included controller has a Thread Group.
If Tree View or Summary Results is not a child of Parent Test plan but only child of Thread Goupd including other plan then it won't contain all samplers.
See attached test plan.
But in documentation it is stated that Included Test plan should use Test Fragments so is this a bug ?

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: Still not fixed in 2.5.1 if it's really an issue.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: Nested Thread Groups are not supported.
